Danny, 27, has a small store.  She lives with her children who are 11, 3 and one year of age in an area of Guayaquil, called Suburbio, notable because most of its residents are merchants.

She started her business buying a small amount of goods in order to support her children since she is separated.  Gradually, with much effort and dedication she was able to invest more money in vegetables and fruits to have more variety in her sales.  Currently, she works alone from very early in the morning until 9pm.  She sells canned goods, vegetables, grains, etc.  Although she does not have her spouse she wants to continue to work to provide a better life for her children.

She will use the loan to buy canned goods and rice for her store.  In the future she’d like to have a minimarket so that her children will have a better economic situation.

loans.use: For canned goods and rice.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es:
El Sr. Ernesto tiene 54 años de edad, vive en domicilio propio con su compañera.
 Él se dedica a la talabartería desde el año 1996, dicha vocación lo heredó de su padre quien en tiempos de su niñez ya le enseñó los secretos de dicho arte y Ernesto le ayudaba en el trabajo.
Ernesto vende sus mercaderías por el interior del país, en su negocio le ayudan sus hijos, él es cliente excelente recurrente de la fundación y comenta que gracias a los préstamos que consiguió de la institución fue creciendo como microempresario. 
El crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de cuero ya que está teniendo mucha demanda de sus mercaderías y desea cumplir con todos los pedidos de su numerosa clientela.
texts.en:
Mr. Ernesto is 54 years old and lives in his own home with his common-law wife. He has worked making saddles since 1996, and inherited this vocation from his father who taught him the secrets of the craft from a young age when Ernesto would help him at work. Ernesto sells his merchandise around the interior part of the country. His children help him at his business.

He has been an excellent client of the loan foundation and shares that, thanks to the loans he has gotten through this organization, he has been able to grow as a small-business owner. The loan he requests will be used to buy leather as demand for his products is currently very high and he desires to fill all the requests of his numerous customers.

loans.use: To buy leather

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy Avon products.

loans.name: Sandra Eloisa

texts.es: Sandra Eloísa tiene su negocio de manera ambulante, su mayor desafío recentinamente es no ofrecer la gran variedad de productos que sus clientes le solicitan. Sandra se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general tiene trabajando desde hace 13 años, por lo que se siente satisfecha con los financiamientos que ha realizado.  La señora solicita un nuevo préstamo que le permitirá incrementar el capital de su negocio en la compra de ropa, cosméticos, calzado, sabanas, entre otras cosas. Su sueño es progresar y seguir adelante en su negocio. Ya que en esta época recibe muchos encargos.
texts.en:
Sandra Eloísa has an itinerant sales business.  Her greatest challenge is not having available the great variety of products her customers request.  She has sold general merchandise for 13 years and feels satisfied with the loans she has had.

She is asking for a new loan to buy clothes, cosmetics, footwear and bed sheets, among others.  Her dream is to make progress and continue forward with her business since this season she gets lots of orders.

loans.use: To buy assorted general merchandise.

loans.name: Flora

texts.es:
La señora Flora tiene 44 años de edad, es separada, tiene 2 hijas que la ayudan en el salón de belleza que posee en el centro de la ciudad de Itá, dicha actividad lo ejerce hace mas de 15 años. Realiza todo tipo de trabajos de belleza como cortes para dama, peinados, lavado, alargue de cabello, manicura, pedicuro, tinte y otros servicios de belleza, 1 de sus hijas la ayuda con servicios de maquillaje ya que la misma es maquilladora profesional y la otra con lavados y cortes.
La señora Flora es cliente de la Fundación Paraguaya desde el año 2.006 demostrando responsabilidad con el pago puntual de sus cuotas, la misma solicita para la compra de insumos para peluquería como shampoo, tintes, cabello para alargue, pinta uñas y otros atendiendo a que se acerca fin de año y se prepara con antelación ya que en esta época se incrementan los precios de todos los productos.
texts.en:
Flora is 44 years old.  She is separated and has 2 daughters who help her in her beauty salon which is located in Itá city center.  She has been in this business for more than 15 years.  She provides all kinds of beauty treatments such as ladies' haircuts, hair styling, hair washing, hair extensions, manicures, pedicures, hair coloring and other beauty services.  One of her daughters helps her with her make-up services since she is a professional make-up artist and the other daughter helps her to wash and cut hair.

Flora has been a Fundación Paraguaya client since 2006.  She has always been responsible, making her repayments punctually.  She is requesting a loan to buy supplies for her hairdressing service such as shampoo, dyes, hair extensions, nail polishes and other products as the end of the year is approaching and she is getting ready in advance since during that period the price of all products increases.

loans.use: To buy dyes, gel, shampoo, rinses, hair extensions and other products

loans.name: Otuma Ole

texts.en:
Otuma Ole K. is 50 years old. He is married to Leah K. and is the father of seven children. He has been farming his own piece of land since 2007.
  
He learned about KADET from a colleague who is already a KADET registered client. This will be his second loan, with which he is planning to plant more wheat and buy fertilizer. With the profits he hopes to make from the proceeds of this loan, he plans to re-invest in the farm and plant more acres of wheat and purchase seeds and fertilizer.

His hope and dream is to become a large scale farmer in wheat production.

loans.use: To plant more wheat on his farm and buy fertilizer

loans.name: Mwangi Mugo

texts.en:
Mwangi is 47 years old, a businessman and a farmer. He is married to Susan, who manages their retail shop. They have two children. 

Mwangi has been running a retail shop and farming for the past three years. His monthly income is approximately $215, which he uses to support his family. With the loan he plans to add stock to his store, including cooking fat, wheat flour and milk, and to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer. 

With the anticipated profit from their businesses he intends to construct rental houses and to expand his farming and the retail shop.

Mwangi has never borrowed from any MFI (micro-finance institution) before. He was introduced to KADET LTD through a KADET credit officer, and this is his first loan. His hopes and dreams are to own a wholesale shop, educate his children and enable them to achieve their dreams in life.

loans.use: To add stock e.g cooking fat,wheat flour and farm input.

loans.name: Boniface Kituku

texts.en:
Boniface is 40 years old and married to Catherine. He supports four members of his family. He is a blacksmith. He buys scrap metals and makes different items such as jikos (charcoal stoves) and other stoves.  He has been in the business for one year with a monthly income of approximately $150. 

He has never borrowed from any other MFI (micro-finance institution), and he is applying for his 1st loan from KADET LTD to buy tools and more scrap metals for his business. He hopes to improve the living standards of his family and to educate his children.

loans.use: To buy tools and scrape metals

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El Sr. Francisco tiene 42 años de edad, tiene dos hijos, vive en su casa propia.
Tiene su propio taller mecánico de camiones en donde repara vehículos de la marca SCANIA. 
Cuenta que antes de independizarse trabajaba para otra persona, pero con el tiempo fue aprendiendo con la práctica y luego logró estudiar y desde el 2003 abrió su propio taller. 
En su actividad como mecánico le está yendo muy bien ya que gracias al servicio bien brindado a sus clientes puede obtener buenos ingresos y así solventar todos los gastos familiares. 
Tiene un vehículo el cual lo utiliza en el trabajo para casos urgentes, pero una semana atrás tuvo un desperfecto mecánico, para lo cual solicita este crédito debido a que necesita comprar un repuesto para su automóvil.  Su objetivo principal es seguir creciendo en lo profesional y económico para que el día de mañana, cuando sus hijos culminen el colegio, puedan tener la oportunidad de ingresar a la universidad y culminar alguna carrera.
texts.en:
Francisco is 42 years old.  He has two children and lives in his own home.  He has his own truck repair shop where he repairs SCANIA vehicles.  He tells us that before he became self employed he worked for another person but, over time, he learned through practice, managed to study and then in 2003 opened his own workshop.

He is doing very well in his work as a mechanic.  Thanks to the good service which he gives his customers, he has been able to make good profits and use these to cover his family expenses.

Francisco has a vehicle which he uses in his work for urgent jobs but a week ago it suffered from a mechanical failure.  He is requesting this loan because he needs to buy a spare part for it.  His main goal is to continue growing financially and as a professional so that later, when his children finish school, they can have the opportunity to go to university and complete their university studies.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for his vehicle

loans.name: Danny Alfredo

texts.es:
Danny Alfredo G. M. tiene 30 anos. Es soletero  vive con los padres, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. No  Tiene hija 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El Recreo este grupo se dedica exclusivamente a labores agrícolas especialmente a la siembra de cultivo de ciclo corto como es el maíz, arroz, soya y fréjol. Todos los socios son del mismo sector recinto San Vicente Las lomas Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos a esta ventanillas pertenecen 12 socios.

Danny se dedica a la agricultura especialmente ala siembra de maíz desde hace 5 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueno es mejorar económicamente.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Danny Alfredo G. M.  is 30 years old.  He is single and lives with his parents in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  He doesn't have any children.

The members of the 'El Recreo' solidarity group work exclusively in farming, especially growing short-cycle crops such as corn, rice, soya and beans.  All the members of the group are from the same area San Vicente Las Lomas in Ventanas canton, Los Ríos province.  There are 12 members in this solidarity group.

Danny has worked as a farmer, mainly growing corn, for 5 years.  He sells his products in Ventanas market.  He is requesting this loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizer to grow his corn.  The support of this loan will help him financially to cover his needs.  He faces challenges such as infestations, diseases and changes in the climate.  His dream is to improve financially.  He likes to take part in sports.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Alonso Edison

texts.es:
Alonso Edison P. L. tiene 34 años. Es soletero  vive con unos amigos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. No  Tiene hija
 
Los miembros de la V.R.C. El Recreo este grupo se dedica exclusivamente a labores agrícolas especialmente a la siembra de cultivo de ciclo corto como es el maíz, arroz, soya y fréjol. Todos los socios son del mismo sector recinto San Vicente Las lomas Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos a esta ventanillas pertenecen 12 socios.

Alonso se dedica a la agricultura especialmente ala siembra de maíz desde hace 5 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueno es mejorar la vivienda.

Le gusta hacer deporte y escuchar musica.
texts.en:
Alonso Edison P. L., 34, is single and lives with some friends in Ventanas, Los Ríos province.  He has no children.

Members of the El Recreo communal bank are dedicated exclusively to farming, especially short-cycle crops like corn, rice, soy and broad beans.  All the members are from the same neighborhood: San Vicente in Las Lomas, Ventanas canton, Los Ríos province.  It has 12 members.

Alonso has been a farmer, especially corn, for five years.  He buys his products in Ventanas and sells them at the Ventanas farmers market.

He is asking for funds to buy farming supplies and fertilizers for his corn crops.  Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs. They face challenges like plant diseases and infestations as well as weather variability.  His dream is to make home improvements.

He enjoys playing sports and listening to music.

loans.use: To buy farming supplies and fertilizer.

loans.name: Gladys Birmania

texts.es:
Gladys Birmania G. M. tiene 39 años. Vive en Union Libre,  vive con la compañera y con los hijos, vive  en el cantón de Ventanas en la Provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. El Recreo este grupo se dedica exclusivamente a labores agrícolas especialmente a la siembra de cultivo de ciclo corto como es el maíz, arroz, soya y fréjol. Todos los socios son del mismo sector recinto San Vicente Las lomas Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos a esta ventanillas pertenecen 12 socios.

Gladys se dedica a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz desde hace 3 años. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y los vende en la feria de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueno es dar el estudio a los hijos.
Le gusta bailar.
texts.en:
Gladys Birmania G. M. is 39 years old. She lives is in a common law marriage with her partner and children. She lives in the Ventanas canton in the province of Los Ríos. She has 2 children. 

The members of the V.R.C. El Recreo group work exclusively in agriculture, especially in short cycle cultivation such as corn, rice, soy and beans. All of the members are from the same area of the San Vicente Las Lomas community in the Ventanas canton, province of Los Ríos. 12 people belong to this bank.  

Gladys has worked in agriculture, especially growing corn, for more than 3 years. She buys her products in Ventanas and sells them at the market in  Ventanas.

She is asking for the loan to buy agricultural materials and fertilizers to grow corn. With the support of the loan, she will be financially supported to meet her needs. They are facing challenges such as pests and diseases and weather variation. Her dream is to give her children an education. She likes to dance.

loans.use: To buy agricultural materials and fertilizers

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es: Marlene tiene 41 años vive al lado de su esposo y sus 4 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 1 año instaló una tienda de comestibles en la cochera de su casa, desde entonces le ha ido muy bien, y en poco tiempo logró ampliar este negocio. Aún recuerda cuando empezó solo con algunas cosas, estaba casi vacía; hoy vende de todo un poco, en productos de primera necesidad y al gusto y alcance del bolsillo de sus clientes; además ha incursionado con la venta de gas, de esa manera sus ingresos han aumentado. Le gusta mucho su trabajo porque se distrae bastante, aunque no puede salir mucho por atender la tienda, además  por las ventas obtiene buenas ganancias que le permiten comprar cosas necesarias para el hogar y darse  sus gustos. Como es una mujer muy emprendedora, para el futuro tiene planeado ampliar las instalaciones de su tienda y surtirla de mayor cantidad de productos, para que sus clientes encuentren en su negocio de todo un poco. Es su segundo crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería para abastecer su tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Marlene, 41, lives with her husband and four children in her own house.  For the last year she has had a grocery store in her garage.  Since then she has done well and in a short period of time was able to expand the business.  She still remembers starting off with just a few items, it was almost empty.  Today, she sells a bit of everything to do with basic needs at prices that are accessible to her customers.  She has also started to sell gas and income has increased as a result.

She enjoys her work very much because it distracts her, even though she can’t go out much because she has to tend to the store.  Also because of the profits she earns that make it possible for her to buy things she needs for the house and she can treat herself.

Because she is quite an enterprising woman she plans to expand her store in the future and stock it with more merchandise so that her customers will find a bit of everything in her store.

This is her second loan with MFP and she is very happy to know that she has financial help.  Besides, she enjoys being part of a communal bank because all its members are responsible, mutually supportive people.  

She thanks all those who will fund the loan she is requesting because it will be very useful for her business.  She plans to use the requested funds to stock her grocery store.

loans.use: To stock her store with a variety of products.

loans.name: Mariana Fanny

texts.es:
Marina de 57 años, tiene un pequeño puesto de venta de artículos, productos y víveres en la parte delantera de su casa. Vive en una zona urbana caracterizada porque la mayoría de sus habitantes son comerciantes llamada suburbio de Guayaquil.  

Para poder mantener a su familia ella se la ha ingeniado vender todo tipo de artículo, víveres, productos de uso personal en los años que han pasado. Vendiendo desde un puesto que ella adecuo en su casa los artículos y productos ha podido ampliar su negocio con ventas de productos Yambal (compañía de productos de uso personal) y Esika (compañía de ropa por catalogo). 
 
Para que su negocio siga con los ingresos que ha tenido ella quiere comprar con el préstamo ropa esika para que sus clientes tengan más variedad al ir a comprar. En el futuro quiere incrementar su mercadería y tener mercadería en stop.
texts.en:
Marina, 57, has a small stand in the front of her house where she sells items, products and groceries.  She lives in an urban zone in Guayaquil, called Suburbio, notable because most of its residents are merchants.

To support her family she devised ways to sell all kinds of items, groceries and personal use items over the last few years.  Selling products and items from the stand she set up in her home she has managed to expand the business selling Yanbal and Esika products.  Yanbal are personal use products and Esika is a catalogue clothing firm.

So that her business can continue producing income she wants to use the loan to buy Esika clothes so that her customers will have a wider variety available for purchase.  In the future she’d like to increase her merchandise and have merchandise in stock.

loans.use: For clothes.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta tiene 30 años, vive al lado de su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Desde muy pequeña sus padres le enseñaron las técnicas de la agricultura, es por eso que cuando se casó y formó su propia familia no dudo en ayudar a su esposo en el sustento del hogar y empezó junto con él a sembrar maíz en grandes cantidades. Le gusta mucho la labor de campo ya que es la única actividad que sabe como se realiza, además que le proporciona buenas ganancias, pues el maíz que cosecha lo vende a un molino de la zona y con ello obtiene capital asegurado, sin embargo para alcanzar tener una buena cosecha de maíz es de mucho dedicación y trabajo; pero eso no la detiene por que sabe que todo esfuerzo tiene su recompensa. Como es una mujer muy laboriosa que siempre se proyecta al futuro, tiene planeado sembrar otros vegetales en sus tierras. Es su tercer crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita,  lo invertirá en la compra de abono para su campaña de siembra.
texts.en:
Marta, 30, lives with her husband and two children in her own home.  When she was still very young her parents taught her how to farm.  So, when she got married and formed her own family she didn’t hesitate to help her husband support the home and started to help him plant corn in large quantities.

She enjoys farming very much because it’s the only work she knows how to do.  Besides, it’s quite profitable because the corn she harvests she sells to a local mill so her income is steady.  However, in order to get a good corn crop much dedication and hard work are required.  This doesn’t stop her, though, because she knows that all effort brings its own reward.  Because she is a hard working woman she’s always looking to the future.  She plans to plant other vegetables on her land.

This is her third loan with MFP.  She is happy to know that she has financial help and enjoys being part of a communal bank because all its members are responsible, mutually supportive people.

She thanks all the people who will fund her loan because it will be very useful for her business’ progress.  She will use it to buy manure for her crops.

loans.use: To buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es: Noemí tiene 56 años, vive al lado D. su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. DesD. hace 32 años se dedica a la agricultura, sembrando papa y maíz, asimismo práctica la ganadería, por lo que  tiene vacas y toros en su establo, y con la ayuda D. esposo e hijos la ayudan en la alimentación D. estos animales. Manifiesta que le agrada trabajar en la ganadería porque le otorga mejores ganancias que la agricultura misma, además siempre tiene disponible la leche que producen sus vacas, logrando venderlos todas las mañanas, generándose más ingresos económicos.  Ante esto, tiene el anhelo D. incrementar su capital D. trabajo con la compra D. más vacas y toros. Es crédito numero 6 que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta D.  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte D. su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso D. su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra D. sacos D. abono porque empezará a sembrar pastizales que lo utilizará como forraje para sus animales.
texts.en:
Noemí, 56, lives with her husband and three children in her own house.  She has been a farmer for the last 32 years farming potato and corn.  She also raises cattle; she has three cows and bulls in her stable.  Her husband and children help her feed the animals.

She states that she enjoys working raising cattle because it’s more profitable than farming.  Besides, she always has milk available that her cows produce that she can sell every morning generating more income.  In face of the above, she wants to increase her capital buying more cows and bulls.

This is her 6th loan with MFP and she is happy to know that she has financial support.  Besides, she enjoys being part of a communal bank because all its members are responsible and mutually supportive people.

She thanks all the people who will fund the loan she’s requesting because it will be very useful for her business’ success.  She will use it to buy sacks of manure because she is going to start to plant grasses to use as forage for her animals.

loans.use: To buy sacks of manure because she is going to start to plant grasses to use as forage for her animals.

loans.name: Juana Dolores

texts.es:
Doña Juana S. se dedica al comercio y su actividad principal es la venta de comidas, negocio que opera bajo el nombre de Comedor “JUTIAPA”, doña juanita como mas se le conoce en la aldea de Jutiapa tiene 30 años de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad.
Sus condiciones de vida son favorables.
Sus clientes la prefieren por la atención que les brinda, la higiene con que prepara los alimentos, el buen gusto que le da a las comidas y por ultimo el precio.
Doña Juanita es Soltera y madre de 4 hijos, se separo de su esposo quedando a cargo de sus hijos y  nos comento que con los ingresos de su comedor logro graduar de carreras universitarias a todos sus hijos, dos de ellas son Licenciadas En pedagogía Maestras, otra hija es enfermera y su único hijo varón de Ingeniero Agrónomo.
Actualmente ya solo depende una muchacha de ella, misma que tomo en manera de adopción y que actualmente esta cursando sus estudios de secundaría y manifestó que si la muchacha se porta bien también le brindara estudios superiores.
las condiciones de su negocio son favorables y cada día que pasa ganas más popularidad, su comedor se a convertido en una fuente de empleo dentro de la aldea ya que ella permanente paga 2 empleadas para que le ayuden en la preparación de los alimentos.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar mas alimentos ya que ahora la demanda es mayor y necesita tener mas inventario de alimentos.
texts.en:
Juana S.'s main business activity is selling meals.  Her eatery operates under the name “Jutiapa”.  Doña Juanita, as she is better known in the village of Jutiapa, has been in this business for 30 years.  Her living conditions are good.

Juanita's customers prefer her business because of the service which she provides, the hygiene with which she prepares her food, the great taste which she gives her food and, finally, her prices.  Juanita is single and has 4 children.  She separated from her husband and was left with all the children in her care.  She tells us that, through the profits she has made in her eatery, she has managed to get all of her children through university.  Two of her daughters have degrees in education and are teachers, another daughter is a nurse and her only son is an agronomist.

Currently only one of her girls still depends on her.  This is a daughter who she adopted and who is currently studying at high school.  She says that if she is very well behaved she will also get a higher education.

Juanita's business is doing well and every day it becomes more popular.  Her eatery has become a source of employment within her village since she now pays 2 permanent employees who help her in preparing her meals.

She will use this loan to buy more food since right now she has a high demand and she needs to have a greater inventory of food.

loans.use: To buy meat, tortillas, butter, oil, condiments, potatoes, cabbage, tomatoes, onions, peppers, carrots, chicken, soft drinks, rice, beans, bread, coffee, cookies

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Preventiva

texts.es: Preventiva tiene 37 años, vive con su cónyuge y sus 2 hijas en una casa alquilada. Desde hace 4 años se dedica a la crianza de animales como cuyes, conejos, carneros y pollos, en donde su prioridad es alimentarlos para que tenga el peso exacto para poder venderlos en el mercado mayoristas de su ciudad. De esta manera se gana la vida, vendiendo estos animales a sus asiduos compradores, en donde siempre la esperan para llevar la mercadería que ofrece. Le gusta mucho su actividad porque se entretiene mucho, además la crianza de estos animales no es difícil, en ocasiones recibe la ayuda de sus hijas y con las ganancias que obtiene ayuda a su esposo con los constantes gastos del hogar. Paralelamente a esta actividad, siembra papa y maíz cuya cosecha comercializa también en el mercados de la zona donde vive. Como es una mujer emprendedora, para el futuro tiene planeado comprar mayor cantidad de animales, ya que sabe que este negocio es muy rentable. Es su segundo crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, asimismo agradece a topas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más animales y otra parte en el pago de un terreno que esta comprando para poder construir su casa, así como su granja.
texts.en:
Preventiva is 37 years old and lives with her spouse and their 2 daughters in a rented house.  She has been raising animals such as guinea pigs, rabbits,  rams and chickens for 4 years.  She makes it a priority to feed them adequately so that they reach the exact weight in order to be able to sell them at the wholesale market in the city.  This is how she earns a living, selling these animals to her regular buyers.  They are always waiting for her to bring her merchandise.  She loves this job because she finds it very entertaining and it is not difficult.  Occasionally, her daughters help her and with the earnings she is able to help her husband with the never ending household expenses.  In addition to raising animals, she grows potatoes and corn that she sells in the markets in the region where she lives.  

Since she is an enterprising woman, she plans to buy more animals because she knows that this is a profitable business.  This is her second loan with MFP and she is very happy to know that she has financial support.  She likes being a part of her communal bank because all the members are  very supportive and responsible people.  She is grateful to everyone who will be a part of making this loan a reality as it will be very useful in advancing her business.  She will use part of the loan to buy more animals and the other part to make payment on a piece of land that she is buying to build her house and farm on.

loans.use: To buy more animals and to construct her house and farm

loans.name: Cesar Gonzalo

texts.es:
Cesar de 44 años, tiene una tienda de víveres. Vive en una zona urbana caracterizada porque la mayoría de sus habitantes son comerciantes llamada suburbio de Guayaquil.  

La tienda la empezó el papa pero cuando el falleció Cesar tuvo que hacerse cargo de ella para poder tener estabilidad económica. Con la ayuda de su esposa pudo surtir mas la tienda y seguir con el negocio de su papa. En su tienda vende arroz, aceites, enlatados, snack, bebidas, panes etc. Con ayuda de sus hijos también puede atender la tienda ellos al llegar del colegio le ayudan. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar víveres como granos, enlatados y harina para tener más variedad en sus productos. En el futuro quiere tener una panadería bien surtida.
texts.en:
Cesar, 44, has a grocery store.  He lives in an urban zone in Guayaquil, called Suburbio, which is notable because most of its residents are merchants.

The store was started by his father but after he died Cesar had to take charge of it in order to have economic stability.  With help from his wife they were able to stock it better and continue with his father’s business.  He sells rice, oils, canned goods, snacks, beverages, baked goods, etc. in the store.  His children also help tend to the store when they get home from school.

He will use the loan to buy groceries like grains, canned goods and flour to have more product variety.  In the future he’d like to have a well stocked bakery.

loans.use: For flour, canned goods, grains.

loans.name: Dilma De La Cruz

texts.es:
La Sra. Dilma de la Cruz se dedica al comercio y su actividad principal es la venta de comidas rápidas (Golosinas) negocio ubicado en la caseta del Instituto Polivalente “UNION DE ORIENTE” 
Doña Dilma además de dedicarse a la venta de golosinas también elabora comidas para los maestros (desayunos y almuerzos) mismos que le cancelan cada vez que reciben el sueldo; dicho centro de estudios cuenta con una asistencia de alumnos promedio de 380 estudiantes.
Doña Dilma esta casada y de su matrimonio procrearon 2 hijos pero ya no dependen de ellos ya que sus hijos formaron su propios hogares pero si les brindaron la educación graduándolos de estudios secundarios, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería.
Su negocio se ha convertido en una pequeña fuente de empleo, ya que tiene contratadas 2 empleadas para que le ayuden en el mismo.
El crecimiento de su negocio es notable y sus condiciones de vida son favorables.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de alimentos ya que las ventas han incrementado y no cubre con todas las necesidades de todos los alumnos.
texts.en:
Mrs Dilma de la Cruz's main business activity is selling fast food (snacks).  Her business is located in Unión de Oriente school.  Dilma also prepares meals for the teachers (breakfasts and lunches).  The teachers pay her when they receive their wages.  The school has a roll call of approximately 380 students.

Dilma is married and has 2 children from her marriage who are no longer dependent on herself and her husband since they have set up their own homes.  However, she did make sure that they finished their secondary education.  Her husband works as a crop farmer and livestock farmer.

Dilma's business has become a small source of employment since she now has 2 employees who she pays to help her in her business.  The growth of her business has been remarkable and her living conditions are good.  She will use her loan to buy food since her sales have increased and can't cover the needs of all the pupils.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks, beans, corn flour, bread, butter, oil, margarine, cookies, churros, beef, pork, chicken, eggs, cabbage, tomatoes, onions, salt and condiments

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Flora Maria

texts.es:
La Sra. Flora M. se dedica al comercio y su actividad principal es la venta de Golosinas negocio ubicado en la caseta de los talleres del Instituto Polivalente “UNION DE ORIENTE” ubicado en el Barrio El Estero de la Aldea de Jutiapa.
En dichos talleres los alumnos aprenden a trabajar en estructuras metálicas, ebanistería, el trabajo de la tierra (siembra de hortalizas y granos) por riego. 
Doña Flora tiene dos años de vender en la caseta de dicho centro de estudio,  además de dedicarse a la venta de golosinas también elabora comidas para los maestros de los talleres (desayunos y almuerzos) 
La Sra. M. nos comento que cuando el periodo de clases termina ella vende comidas y golosinas en su casa de habitación ya que la mayoría de la gente sabe que ella se dedica a este negocio y por tal razón la siguen buscando.
Su negocio se mantiene estable al igual que sus condiciones de vida.
Doña Flora esta casada y su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, del matrimonio que tiene formado ya solo depende una joven que en estos momentos esta cursando estudios secundarios.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de materiales para fabricar las golosinas, refrescos y otros.
texts.en:
Mrs Flora M.'s main business activity is selling snacks.  Her business is located in the workshop section of Unión de Oriente school which is in the El Estero neighborhood of Jutiapa.

In these workshops, the pupils learn metalwork, cabinet-making, and how to work the land (sowing vegetables and grains) using irrigation.  Flora has been selling in the school for two years.  As well as selling snacks, she also makes meals for the workshop teachers (breakfasts and lunches).

Mrs M. tells us that when classes finish she sells meals and snacks from her home since most people know that she is in this business and, for that reason, they seek her out.  Her business is stable, as are her living conditions.

Flora is married and her husband is a farmer.  From her marriage, she has only one child still dependent.  At the moment her daughter is attending high school.  She will use the loan to buy materials for making snacks, to buy soft drinks and other products.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks, churros, pork, beef, chicken, tortillas, butter, oil, cabbage, onions, tomatoes, garlic, salt, condiments, juice, cheese, beans, flour tortillas, eggs and coffee

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Marcela Alexandra

texts.es:
Marcela de 43 años, vende ropa en un puesto de ropa. Vive con sus dos hijos en una zona urbana caracterizada porque la mayoría de sus habitantes son comerciantes llamada suburbio de Guayaquil. 

Su ex esposo la abandono por eso decidió invertir sus ahorros y comenzar a tener una actividad comercial para poder mantener a sus dos hijos por lo que más fácil era la venta de ropa  en un puesto. En la actualidad tiene ya su puesto de ropa en un local en donde vende pantalones, blusas, chaquetas de hombre y mujer etc. Los precios son muy económicos, porque la ropa la comprar al por mayor. 

Para seguir con su negocio ella quiere comprar ropa para tener más ingresos para su familia. En el futuro quiere incrementar su negocio y tene mas ganancias para darle una buena vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Marcela is 43 years old.  She sells clothes from a clothes stall.  She lives with her two children in an urban area which is known for the fact that most of its inhabitants are salespeople.  It is the suburb of Guayaquil.

Marcela's ex-husband abandoned her and so she decided to invest her savings and start a business activity which would enable her to support her two children.  The easiest option was to sell clothes from a stall.  She currently has her clothes stall in premises where she sells pants, blouses, men's and women's jackets, etc.  Her prices are very cheap because she buys her clothes wholesale.

To continue with her business she would like to buy clothes to provide more income for her family.  In the future, she would like to increase her business and make more profit so that she can give her children a good life.

loans.use: To buy clothes

loans.name: Yader Fernando

texts.es: Yader de 44 años, se dedica a brindar el servicio de taxi vive con su hijo de 13 años, que está a su cargo. Inicio como chofer de otro taxi, ya que no tenía suficiente capital, por lo que siempre ha buscado la forma de mejorar sus ingresos. Sus servicios los ofrece todos los días desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche, por lo que no puede trabajar hasta muy tarde por los problemas. El quiere seguir con su negocio para seguir manteniendo a su familia. Por eso necesita el financiamiento para la compra de llantas, repuestos y ciertas reparaciones que tiene que hacer a su unidad.  En el futuro quiere obtener otro taxi y seguir ofreciendo un buen servicio.
texts.en: Yader, 44, lives with his 13 year old son, and he has a taxi.  He started as a driver for another taxi since he didn’t have enough capital, but he has always been looking for a way to increase his income.  He works every day from 6 in the morning to 10 at night but he can’t work later because of the problems.  He wants to continue with his business so that he can keep supporting his family.  That is why he needs financing so that he can buy tires, replacement parts, and for some repairs that he needs to make on his car.  In the future he would like to have another taxi and continue offering good service.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Gloria se dedica a la elaboración y venta de golosinas actividad que lleva a cabo en su casa de habitación, empieza a elaborar las golosinas todos los días en horas de la tarde y sus clientes potenciales son los habitantes de la aldea de Jutiapa, Jamastran.
Su negocio se mantiene estable y sus condiciones de vida se ve que son favorables.
Doña Gloria es casada y de su matrimonio ya solo dependen 2 dos hijos los cuales en estos momentos están cursando sus estudios secundarios.- El esposo de Doña Gloria labora como guardia de Seguridad de una cooperativa de Créditos ubicada en la misma aldea de donde viven.
Doña Gloria inicio su negocio por que la situación económica en su hogar no era muy favorable y que con los ingresos que percibe su esposo no es lo suficiente para cubrir todas las necesidades del hogar.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de alimentos para la fabricacion de las golosinas.
texts.en:
Gloria works making and selling snacks.  This is a business activity which she carries out in her home.  She begins to make her snacks every afternoon and her potential customers are the inhabitants of the town of Jutiapa, Jamastran.  Her business is stable and her living conditions are good.

Gloria is married and from her marriage she has only 2 children who are still dependent on her.  Right now they are attending high school.  Gloria's husband works as a security guard for a credit cooperative which is located in their town.

Gloria started her business because the financial situation of her household was not very good and her husband's income was not enough to cover all their household needs.  She will use her loan to buy food for making her snacks.

loans.use: To buy beef, pork, chicken, tortillas, rice, beans, butter, oil, soft drinks, juice, plates, disposable cups, bags and straws

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es: Marcelina, de 37 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Darío de 35 años y sus 4 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Los arduos trabajos que realiza Marcelina junto a su esposo en su chacra, han hecho que sus cultivos estén muy bien cuidados y que los días de venta, sus productos sean rápidamente comprados. Su principal fuente de ingresos, es la venta de cacao, café y hojas de coca, los cuales vende en la ciudad de San Francisco. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras, ya que siente que su trabajo esta dando sus frutos, lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de las plagas que pueden afectarlas. Con el tiempo, desea adquirir nuevas tierras, para ampliar sus cultivos. Este es su segundo créditos con MFP, por lo que ha sido muy puntual en sus pagos y nunca ha tenido problemas con su banco comunal, en donde es la encargada de poner la cuota de alegría que mantiene a las demás socias muy felices y unidas. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará semillas de cacao y café para sembrar en esta temporada.
texts.en:
Marcelina, 37, is a cheerful, hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her husband Dario who is 35 and her four little children, to whom she wants to provide a better quality of life. The hard work done by Marcelina and her husband on their farm have resulted in crops that very well looked after, and their products are quickly purchased on the day of sale.

Their main source of income is the sale of cocoa, coffee and coca leaves, which she sells in the city of San Francisco. What she likes most about her job is to harvest their land, as she feels that her work is bearing its fruit. She has spent 15 years doing this work and believes that the hardest thing is to protect their crops from pests that may affect them. Over time, she wants to acquire additional land to expand her crop farming activity.

This is her second loan with MFP. She has been very punctual in her payments and has had no problems with her community bank, where she can be relied on to add a share of joy to keep the other members happy and united. With the 2000 soles requested she will buy cocoa and coffee beans for planting this season.

loans.use: Buy cocoa and coffee beans

loans.name: Sinneh

texts.en:
This is 48-year-old Sinneh.  He is married and has one child, age 13. He has one additional dependent, who lives with him because he adopted her.  

In 1990, Sinneh established his used clothing business. He began his business because he believed it would make him become self reliant. Working seven days a week and twelve hours a day, he earns about $338 every month from this business. 

He needs a loan of 4,000,000 SLL to buy additional bales of used clothing. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately $68. 

In the future, Sinneh plans to build a house and educate his child and his adopted child to the university level.  He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy additional bales of used clothing for resale

loans.name: Marciano

texts.es: Marciano, de 19 años, es un joven muy trabajador y alegre, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Irene de 17 años y lo que más desea es sobre salir en la vida. Teniendo todavía una vida por delante, Marciano sabe que tiene que poner todas sus fuerzas, para lograr ganarse la vida con su labor. Él se dedica a la siembra de cacao, café y hojas de coca, productos que llegada la época de cosecha, llevará a vender a la ciudad de San Francisco, donde sus clientes, conocedores de la calidad de sus cultivos, los compran rápidamente. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus siembras de las plaga de insectos. Lleva 2 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es llevar sus cultivos hasta el lugar donde los vende, ya que los sacos que lleva son muy pesados. En adelante, desea comprar más tierras con las cuales pueda aumentar sus cultivos. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente si desea acceder a otro crédito posteriormente. En su banco comunal, es un socio muy participativo. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará semillas de cacao y café, también comprará sacos de abono.
texts.en:
Marciano, 19, is a hardworking and cheerful young man. He lives in his own home with his wife Irene who is 17. What he wants most is to get on with his life. Still having his full life ahead of him, Marciano knows he has to put all his strength into making a living with his work.

He is dedicated to the cultivation of cocoa, coffee and coca leaf. With the coming harvest season, he will bring his products for sale in the city of San Francisco, where customers know the quality of his crops, and buy them quickly.

What he likes about his job is to protect his crops from insect pests. He has been performing this activity for the past two years and believes that the hardest thing is to get the crops to the place where they are sold, as the bags are quite heavy.

In the future, he wants to buy more land open which he can increase his crops. This is his second loan with MFP. He knows he has to pay his dues on time if he wants to access another loan later. He is a very active partner in their community bank. With the 2,000 soles requested he will buy cocoa and coffee beans, and also bags of fertilizer.

loans.use: Buy cocoa and coffee beans, and bags of fertilizer

loans.name: Anita Nelly

texts.es: La señora Anita Nelly H. B. se dedica a la cosecha de esparragos en un fundo ubicado en la Distrito de Santiago hace varios años. La solicitante vive con su esposo y sus menores hijos quienes estàn en la etapa escolar y su esposo trabaja en el fundo Agroindustrial Beta de esta forma se ayudan con los gastos familiares. Està solicitando el crèdito para mejoramiento de su vivienda y tener mejor calidad de vida, se propone otorgarle el crèdito por que presenta buenas referencias personales y laborales.
texts.en:
For several years Mrs. Anita Nelly H. B. has dedicated herself to the harvest of asparagus on a farm located in the District of Santiago. The applicant lives with her husband and their young children who are in their school years. Her husband works on the Agroindustrial Beta estate, and so they are able to share family expenses.

She is requesting a loan to improve her home and have a better quality of life. She expects the loan to be granted as she has good personal and work references.

loans.use: Personal expenses (home improvement)

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es:
La Señora Luz U. es socia del banco comunal Siempre Amigas, vive en la comunidad de Gualancay que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle, esta parroquia se caracteriza por ser de clima frió, tiene una hermosa vista de la naturaleza, su gente se dedica a la agricultura y cría de animales, también salen a la ciudad a ejercer varias actividades, muchos también han migrado en busca de un mejor trabajo.

La Señora. Luz tiene 48 años, es casada y tiene 6 hijos de 24, 22, 18, 16, 13 y 11 años de edad, su primera hija es casada y vive independiente, su hijo de 22 años  trabaja y es solo para sus gastos, sus otros tres hijos estudian en el colegio y su ultima hija  estudia en la escuela, su esposo labora en la rama de la construcción ya que es albañil, con el trabajo en conjunto han logrado construir su casa propia.
 
Doña Luz se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar en donde cría animales como cerdos, cuyes, pollos y vacas.  La leche que obtiene de las vacas la vende y también es para su consumo, a sus animales los  vende cuando tiene alguna necesidad económica. También se dedica a la agricultura y los productos que obtiene son para el consumo de su hogar y el sobrante los vende en su comunidad.

Se encuentra 5 años en el banco comunal y todos los créditos le han beneficiado en la compra de más animales, ahora  su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de alimento para todos sus animales. Su meta es  criar muchos pollos más para vender.
texts.en:
Señora Luz U. is a member of the communal bank, Siempre Amigas.  She lives in the Community of Gualancay, which pertains to the Parish of the Valley.  This parish is characterized for having a cold climate and a beautiful view of nature.  Its inhabitants work in agriculture and rearing animals.  They also travel to the city to perform various activities, many of whom have also migrated there in search of a better job.

Luz is 48 years old, married, and has 6 children of ages 24, 22, 18, 16, 13, and 11 years old.  Her eldest daughter is married and is independent.  Her son of 22 years old works and covers his own living costs.  Her other three children study in high school, while her youngest daughter studies in elementary school.  Her husband works in construction as a brick layer.  With their two jobs, they have been able to construct their own home.

Doña Luz handles the household chores, which includes the care and raising of animals, such as pigs, guinea pigs, chickens, and cows.  She sells the milk that she gets from the cows and also uses it for their own consumption.  They sell their animals when they have an economic need.  She also works in agriculture and the products that she obtains are consumed in their household and sell any leftovers in their community.  

She has been a member of the communal bank for 5 years.  All of the credit has been used to purchase more animals.  This new credit will be invested towards the purchase of animal feed.  Her goal is to raise a lot of chicken to be sold.

loans.use: Purchase animal feed.

loans.name: Luisa Esperanza

texts.es: Luisa Esperanza tiene 53 años, su actividad es la venta de muebles. Desde hace 14 años que se dedica a este negocio, ella es una mujer muy luchadora y triunfadora. Inicio como medio de ingreso para mantener a su hijo que está a su cargo, pues siempre está al pendiente de lo que sus clientes le soliciten, ya que es una amplia variedad de productos, como sillas, comedores, escritorio, roperos y mesas. Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de materia prima ya que se acerca una buena temporada.
texts.en: Luisa Esperanza is 53 years old.  She has a business selling furniture.  She has been in this business for 14 years.  Luisa Esperanza is a fighter and a winner.  She started this business to support her child who is in her care.  She always keeps an ear open for what her customers are requesting since it is a wide range of products such as chairs, dining room furniture, desks, closets and tables.  She is requesting this loan to buy raw materials since a good season is approaching.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel, de 23 años, es una joven madre de familia muy alegre y luchadora, vive en una casa alquilada junto a su esposo Julio de 35 años y sus 2 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar un mejor futuro. El lugar favorito para comprar ropa en la ciudad de San Francisco (Ayacucho), es un mercado llamado “Gamarrita”, es aquí donde Maribel tiene su puesto de venta. En este lugar vende toda la ropa que trae de la ciudad de Lima, su negocio es muy concurrido, ya que los modelos que vende son muy novedosos y bonitos, todo esto junto a su gran habilidad para persuadir a sus compradores, hacen que su negocio sea muy rentable. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es aconsejar a sus clientas sobre las prendas que mejor les quedan, ya que de esta manera se distrae un poco, lleva 3 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día en su puesto de venta. Con el tiempo, desea poner una tienda más grande, en el cual pueda brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Este es segundo crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente si quiere acceder a otro crédito en el futuro y esta dispuesta a hacerlo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy alegre y siempre esta poniendo la cuota de humor en las reuniones. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más ropa de Lima, de preferencia ropa de verano, ya que este tipo de ropa es la que más se vende en esta parte de la selva peruana.
texts.en:
Maribel is 23 years old.  She is a very happy young mother who is a real fighter.  She lives in a rented house together with her husband, 35 year-old Julio and her 2 beloved children for whom she wants to provide a better future.  The most popular place for buying clothes in the city of San Francisco (Ayacucho) is the Gamarrita market.  This is where Maribel has her stall.  This is where she sells all the clothes that she brings from the city of Lima.  Her business is very busy since the styles she sells are all very new and beautiful and she also has a great skill for persuading her customers.  This makes her business very profitable.

What Maribel most likes about her work is advising her customers on which clothes suit them best since it is a way to entertain herself for a while.  She has been in this business for 3 years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be having to stay at her stall all day.  Over time, she would like to have a larger store in which she could provide her customers with a better service.

This is Maribel's second loan with MFP.  She knows that she has to make all her repayments punctually if she wants to take another loan in the future and she is ready to do so.  She is a very happy member of her community bank and she is always injecting a bit of humor into their meetings.  She will use the 1,500 nuevos soles she is requesting to buy more clothes in Lima, preferably summer clothes since these are the ones that sell best in this part of the Peruvian jungle.

loans.use: To stock up on merchandise (summer clothes)

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es: El Sr. Adrián Vive en el municipio del Torno, localidad Santa Rita, en el barrio Villa Carmelo, es de ocupación albañil y vive mucho tiempo en la comunidad, hace dos años que se dedica a esta actividad, vive en la casa de su madre, están juntando para comprar un lote de terreno para construir su vivienda, el destino del crédito es para la reparación de su vehículo el cual lo utiliza para transportarse  a su lugar de trabajo ya que el Sr. Recorre distancias largas, su esposa con la cual tiene un hijo, es empleada domestica hace dos años, la cual le ayuda en la economía del hogar, es una persona responsable y trabajadora siempre pensando en su familia .
texts.en: Adrián lives in the town of Torno, in Santa Rita, in Villa Carmelo neighborhood.  He is a bricklayer and has lived in the community for a long time.  He started this activity two years ago.  He lives in his mother's house and they are joining together to buy a plot of land on which to build their home.  His loan will be used to repair his vehicle which he uses to commute to work since he has to travel long distances.  His wife, with whom he has a child, has been working as a domestic for two years which helps him with the household finances.  He is a responsible and hard-working person who is always thinking of his family.

loans.use: To repair his vehicle's bodywork

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional provisions such as Ovaltine, powdered milk and mayonnaise

loans.name: Jael Cecilia

texts.es:
La Señora. Jael L. es socia del banco comunal Siempre Amigas, vive en el barrio la Pradera que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle, esta parroquia se caracteriza por ser de clima frió, tiene una hermosa vista de la naturaleza, su gente se dedica a la agricultura y cría de animales, también salen a la ciudad a ejercer varias actividades, muchos también han migrado en busca de un mejor trabajo.

Nuestra socia se dedica a atender la tienda que tiene hace 5 años, labora de domingo a domingo desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche, en sus tiempos libres también se dedica a la venta de cosméticos Avon, lleva 3 años en este negocio y estos productos los vende recorriendo la ciudad y visitando a sus amigas y conocidas.
 
La Señora. Jael tiene 57 años, es casada y tiene 5 hijos de 33, 31, 20, 18, 15 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos son casados y viven  independientes con sus familias, el tercero y cuarto de sus hijos estudian en la universidad y su ultima hija estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo es ebanista y labora en su taller propio, con el trabajo conyugal han logrado construir su casa propia.

Se encuentra en el cuarto crédito que realiza en  el banco comunal y fue  invitada por una amiga a formar parte de este grupo de mujeres triunfadoras.  El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en más productos para su tienda. Su mayor sueño es que sus hijos lleguen a ser profesionales.
texts.en:
Mrs Jael L. is a member of the “Siempre Amigas” (Friends Forever) community bank.  She lives in La Padrera neighborhood in Valle district.  This district is noted for its cold climate.  It has a beautiful view of nature.  The people from this area work as farmers and raise animals.  They also travel to the city to carry out different business activities.  Many have migrated in search of a better job.

Jael serves in the store which she has had for 5 years.  She works every day from 6 in the morning until 10 at night.  In her spare time she also sells Avon products.  She has been selling Avon products for 3 years and she sells in the city and when visiting her friends and acquaintances.

Jael is 57 years old.  She is married and has 5 children aged 33, 31, 20, 18 and 15.  Her eldest two children are married and live with their own families.  Her third and fourth children are studying at university and her youngest daughter is in high school.  Her husband is a cabinet maker who works in his own workshop.  Through their joint work, they have managed to build their own home.

This is the fourth loan that Jael has had from her community bank.  She was invited to join this group of successful women by a friend.  The money from this loan will be invested in buying more products for her store.  Her biggest dream is for her children to become professionals.

loans.use: To buy food products such as sugar, rice, eggs, oil, etc.

loans.name: Nelva

texts.es: Nelva, de 18 años, es una joven muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en casa de sus padres y lo que más desea es forjarse un buen futuro y para ellos esta dispuesta a trabajar muy duro. Con mucho esfuerzo Nelva ha logrado trabajar sus tierras y volverlas muy productivas, ella cultiva, cacao, café y hojas de coca, productos que luego lleva a vender hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, donde las vende al por mayor. Sus cultivos le han dado los ingresos necesarios para mantenerse y ayudar con los gastos familiares, es por eso que desea poner todas sus ganas en sacar adelante este negocio. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos, ya que se siente muy feliz haciéndolo, lleva 3 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que los sacos que lleva son muy pesados y la cansan mucho. En adelante, desea comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar sus cultivos. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en su anterior crédito y espera serlo también ahora. En su banco comunal es una socia muy participativa y siempre esta al tanto de los acuerdos a los que llegan en su grupo. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono, con lo cual espera mejorar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Nelva, who is 18, is a very happy and hard-working young woman. She lives in her parents' house, and what she most wants is to forge a good future, and  she is ready to work very hard for that. With much effort, Nelva has succeeded in working her lands and making them more productive. She grows cacao, coffee, and coca leaves, products that she then takes to sell in the city of San Francisco, where she sells them wholesale. Her crops have given her the necessary income to support herself and to help with the family expenses. It is for this reason that she wants to put all her efforts into advancing this business. What she likes most about her work is taking care of her crops, since she feels very happy doing this. She has been in this business for 3 years, and she finds that the most difficult part is transporting her products, since the sacks that she carries are very heavy and make her very tired. In the future, she wants to buy new land to increase her crops. 

This is her second loan with MFP. She has been very punctual with her previous loan, and she hopes to do so again now.  In her community bank, she is a very active member and is always aware of her group's decisions. With the 2000 PEN that she is applying for, she will buy more manure, with which she hopes to improve her crops.

loans.use: Buy bags of manure.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es: El señor Mariano  cliente nuevo  de edad de 21 años vive en la zona de quebrada seca, oriundo de Santa Cruz.  Su Estado civil concubino con la Sra. Nancy   de edad 18 años cuenta con la actividad de repostería hace   2 años en la localidad de la guardia, los señores no cuentan con  ningún hijo por el momento, pero es un o de sus deseos el de tener hijos.                                                                                                                                                                                                            Actividad: venta de material de construcción  hace 4  años  en la zona de quebrada seca el  Destino del crédito es para la compra de electrodoméstico y para terminar de pagar una moto.                                                                                                         El cliente está agradecido porque nuevamente confiamos en ellos y agilizamos su préstamos para poder invertir en lo que ellos necesitan.
texts.en: Mr. Mariano is a new customer.  He is 21 years old and lives in the Quebrada Seca area and is a native of Santa Cruz.  He is a common law relationship with Mrs. Nancy, 18 years old, who is in the pastry business for the last 2 years in the La Guardia area.  They currently have no children but one of their hopes is to have children in the future.  Activity: sale of construction materials for the last 4 years in the Quebrada Seca area.  The purpose of the loan is to purchase a domestic electrical appliance and finish paying off a motorbike.  The customer is thankful for our new trust in them and our expediting the loan so that they can invest in what they need.

loans.use: Purchase of an electrical appliance and payment of a motorbike.

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna, de 25 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Melcerio de 29 años y sus 2 queridos hijos Edgard de 7 y Keily de 5 años, quienes son el motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. El trabajo que realiza Reynal es el cultivo de cacao, café y hojas de coca, esta labor la realiza junto a su esposo, quien también trabaja arduamente para obtener ingresos para su familia; Ella ha visto por conveniente llevar sus productos hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, ya que según manifiesta, es ahí donde mejores ganancias obtiene. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos de las plaga de insectos ya que pueden perjudicar la productividad de sus frutos. Lleva 7 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que el camino es muy largo y agotador. Con el tiempo, espera comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar sus cultivos y con su venta pueda mejorar sus ingresos económicos. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, se siente en la obligación de pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal, en donde es muy querida. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono para sus cultivos y contratará operarios para que trabaje en la siembra.
texts.en: Reyna, 25 years old, is a simple and hard working woman.  She lives in her own house with her husband Melcerio, 29 years old, and her 2 loved children, Edgard 7 years old and Keily 5 years old, who are the reason for all her hard work.  Reyna works at growing cocoa, coffee and cocoa leaves. This work she does together with her husband who also works arduously to get income for the family.  She takes her products to the city of San Francisco, since, she states, that it is where she makes the best profits.  What she likes most about her work is taking care of her crops from insect infestations since these could negatively affect the productivity of her labor.  She is in this business for 7 years and finds that the hardest task is to transport her products because the road is long and exhausting.  In time she plans to buy new land to increase her harvest and with its sales to be able to increase her income.  This is the second loan with MFP, she feels obligated to pay all her installments on time because she does not want to cause problems to the other members of the community bank where she is very much liked.  With the two thousand new soles that she is requesting she will buy more fertilizer for her crops and contract workers to work the sowing season.

loans.use: Purchase bags of fertilizer and hire workers to help during the sowing of her crops.

loans.name: Simona

texts.es: Simona, de 42 años, es una mujer muy alegre y luchadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Frans de 41 años y sus 5 menores hijos, a quienes desea brindar un mejor futuro. El cultivo de cacao, café y hojas de coca es la actividad que realiza diariamente Simona. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado que sus tierras sean muy productivas, lo cual ha generado que sus cultivos sean de muy buena calidad y muy bien apreciados en la ciudad de San Francisco, que es donde lleva a vender sus productos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 5 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que los sacos que lleva son muy pesados y la cansan mucho. En adelante, desea tener el crédito suficiente para comprar nuevas tierras y así incrementar sus cultivos. Este es el décimo segundo crédito con MFP y espera ser muy puntual en sus cuotas, puesto que no quiere darle problemas a su banco comunal, en el cual se siente muy contenta. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará semillas de cacao y café, sacos de abono y fertilizantes, con lo cual espera mejorar sus cultivos.
texts.en: Simona, age 42, is a very happy and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her 41 year-old husband and her five young children, to whom she desires to offer a better future. The cultivation of cocoa, coffee and coke leaves is the activity that Simona does daily. With much effort she has managed to make her lands be productive, which has made her crops be of good quality. They are well appreciated in the city of San Francisco, which is where she takes her products to be sold. What she likes the most about her work is caring for her crops and she does it with care. She has been doing this activity for five years. She thinks that the most difficult part of the job is transporting the products, since the sacks that she caries are very heavy and they make her very tired. In the future, she desires to have enough money to buy new lands and therefore increase her crops. This is the twelfth loan with MFP and she hopes to be punctual in her payments, since she doesn't want to cause problems for her communal bank, with which she feels very happy. With the 2,000 soles asked for, she will buy cocoa and coffee beans, and sacks of fertilizer, with which she hopes to improve her crops.

loans.use: To buy cocoa beans, coffee, and sacks of fertilizer to improve her productivity.

loans.name: Isatu

texts.en:
This is 36 year-old Isatu.  She is married, and has 3 children aged 17, 14, and 5. She has 2 additional dependents who live with her. They are a brother and sister and need  assistance in their schooling.  In 2008, Isatu established her provision business. She began her business because she believed it could provide more income to support her family. Working 6 days a week and 12 hours a day, she earns about 1,597,200SLL every month from this business. 

Isatu needs a loan of 4,000,000  in order to buy additional cartons of baked beans, sardines, and sugar. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 319,440SLL. Isatu intends to use the proceeds of this loan to educate her children and  buy a piece of land. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: The loan is used to buy additional provisions such as cartons of baked beans, sardines, and sugar

loans.name: Rosa Florencia

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa C. es socia del banco comunal Siempre Amigas, vive en la comunidad de Maluay que  pertenece a la parroquia del Valle, esta parroquia se caracteriza por ser de clima frió, tiene una hermosa vista de la naturaleza, su gente se dedica a la agricultura y cría de animales también salen a la ciudad a ejercer varias actividades, muchos también han migrado en busca de un mejor trabajo.

Doña Rosa tiene 33 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 14, 13 años y su ultimo hijo de 2 meses, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en el colegio. Su esposo se dedica a  la construcción ya que es maestro albañil, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de un familiar.
 
La Señora. Rosa se dedica a la atención de su bazar, este negocio tiene hace 5 años, labora de lunes a sábados desde las 10 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche, el local en donde tiene su negocio es arrendando, a pesar que el mayor tiempo pasa en su negocio nunca descuida a sus hijos.
 
Doña Rosa se encuentra en su décimo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y ha llegando a tener muy buenas amigas, el grupo Siempre Amigas esta conformado por mujeres alegres, luchadoras y trabajadoras.  el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de más mercadería como peluches, zapatos etc., para la temporada de navidad que se acerca. Su mayor sueño es crecer más en su negocio.
texts.en:
Rosa C. is a member of the "Siempre Amigas" ["Friends Always"] communal bank. She lives in the community of Maluay, which belongs to Del Valle parish. This parish is characterized by its cold climate and beautiful natural scenery. Its people work in agriculture and raise animals, and some also go to the city to do a variety of work. Many have also emigrated in search of better jobs. 

Rosa is 33 years old and married, with 3 children: a 14-year-old, 13-year-old, and her latest child only 2 months old. Her two older children are in school. Her husband is a master mason and works in construction. They do not have their own house, so they live in the home of a family member. 
 
Rosa's work is running a small shop with assorted products. She has operated this business for 5 years, and she works from Monday through Saturday from 10 in the morning until 7 at night. The shop where she has her business is rented. In spite of the fact that she spends most of her time at her business, she never neglects her children. 
 
Rosa is in her tenth loan cycle with her communal bank, and she has developed very close friendships there. The "Siempre Amigas" group is made up of women who are cheerful, determined and hard-working. She will invest the funds from her loan in buying more merchandise, such as stuffed animals, shoes, etc., for the Christmas season which is approaching. Her greatest dream is to expand her business even more.

loans.use: Buying stuffed animals, shoes and gifts in general

loans.name: Maura Cecilia

texts.es: Maura Cecilia tiene 49 años, su actividad es una pulpería. Hace más de 30 años que se dedica a este negocio. Inicio su negocio vendiendo ropa nueva, ella otorgaba crédito a ciertos clientes  pero obtuvo muchas pérdidas. Esta no es la primera vez que solicita créditos, ya que han sido necesarios para su negocio. Ella siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer trabajadora y brindar lo mejor de ella. Este es el motivo de su crédito para la compra de materia prima como  sopas, detergentes, huevos, granos básicos, pan y jugos.
texts.en:
Maura Cecilia is 49 years old and has a general store.  She began her business more than 30 years ago.  Initially, Maura Cecilia sold new clothes.  She used to give credit to certain customers but she suffered many losses.

This is not the first time Maura Cecilia has requested a loan; it has been necessary to do so for her business.  Maura Cecilia has always been characterized as a hard-working woman who offers her best.  This is her motive for this loan, to buy primary necessities such as soaps, detergents, eggs, basic grains, bread and juices for her store.

loans.use: TO BUY MERCHANDISE FOR HER GENERAL STORE

loans.name: Isata

texts.en:
This is 34 year-old Isata.  She is married, and has 2 children aged 11, and 10. She has 6 additional dependents, who live with her. They are her sisters and some are students and some assist her with her business.  In 2006, Isata established her Shoes and Clothes business. She began her business because she wanted to be independent. Working 6 days a week and 13 hours a day, she earns about 1,073,000SLL every month from this business. 

Isata needs a loan of 3,000,000SLL. She has a good credit history and now  requires a new loan in order to buy additional jeans, bags, and shoes. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 214,600SLL. 

In the future, Isata plans to expand her business so that she can get a bigger shop, establish an shop for her sisters and also to educate her children to the highest level of education. Three people assist her on a commission basis. She buys her supplies from Guinea, and Liberia twice a month. Isata is very hard working and thanks you for your support.

loans.use: The loan is used to buy additional shoes, bags and jeans for her business

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.es: Ofelia, de 40 años, convive con Alejandro, de 46; ambos tienen 8 hijos, pero solo viven con 5 de ellos en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Kivinaki (selva central peruana). El trabajo al que se dedica ella, es la atención diaria a una pequeña tienda de comestibles, que hace algunos años, acondicionó en un espacio de su casa, ahí todas las mañanas; ofrece productos de primera necesidad a los habitantes de su localidad; de la misma manera; Ofelia, surte su tienda no solo de comestibles, también, incursionó en la venta de artesanía, como: coronas, collares y, demás accesorios femeninos. Hace 3 años que viene comercializando sus accesorios en su tienda, pero de igual forma, viaja a las ciudades cercanas, como: La Merced, San Ramón; de las cuales, ya está recibiendo pedidos al por mayor. Por ello Ofelia, con la ayuda de su esposo; está planeando ahorrar al máximo, para poder terminar su casa y de esa manera darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Ella, es una mujer muy responsable no solo en los pagos a MFP, sino en cada uno de los acuerdos en su banco comunal, este es su sexto crédito que tiene con su entidad de confianza y, está contenta con su progreso. Por ello, con el crédito que obtendrá, comprará insumos para la elaboración de artesanías, además abastecerá su tienda de comestibles con variados productos.
texts.en: Ofelia, 40, lives with Alejandro, 46.  They have eight children, but only five of them live at home with them in the community of Kivinaki (Peruvian central jungle).  She makes a living by taking care of a small grocery store.  A few years ago she fixed up a space in her home for the store and she is there everyday.  She sells prime goods to the people of her area.  At the same time, Ofelia not only stocks her store with groceries, but also with crafts like crowns, necklaces, and other accessories for ladies.  She has been selling accessories from her store for three years now, but she also travels to nearby cities like La Merced and San Ramon, cities she is already getting wholesale orders from.  Ofelia, with her husband's help, is planning to save as much as possible to finish her house and in this way be able to provide her children with a better quality of life.  She is a very responsible woman, not only with her payments to MFP, but also with all of her contracts with her communal bank.  This is  her sixth loan with her bank and she is happy with her progress.  Therefore, she will buy supplies to make crafts with and also stock her grocery store with various products with the loan.

loans.use: To purchase supplies to make crafts and stock her store with a variety of products.

loans.name: Robertha Lisseth

texts.es: Robertha Lisseth es una madre de familia de 32 años que reside junto a su esposo y a sus 2 hijos. Robertha tiene su negocio que es la venta de mercadería en general pues ofrece calzado, cosméticos, ropa en general y sus ventas los realiza a diario  en su domicilio y de manera ambulante sus principales clientes son los pobladores de la zona, tiene varios años de experiencia en este rubro, y debido a la calidad de productos que ofrece y al buen trato que brinda cuenta con una clientela fiel.
